page.title: 18FACTORY VISITS IN LIVINGSTON
page.content: We visited{Scintronix Ltd}which designs and manufactures{Gamma {Cameras.}This is a camera which photographs gamma rays instead of light rays. If it is suspected you have a cancer, you are given an injection of radioactive material. This chemical can be made to collect in the organ of the body being examined. It gives off gamma rays which can then be photographed by the gamma camera. At{Lothian Glass Products Ltd}we were interested in seeing how a computer is used to do all the office work, previously needing 3 office staff. The computer can keep an up to date record of stock; calculate the cost and print out invoices for customers; work out the measurements of the glass needed and even show how to cut the glass so there is very little wastage.
